# Pull Request

## Summary

Describe what this PR changes and why.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] CI / Tooling

## Validation

List commands executed and outcomes.

- [ ] `make build`
- [ ] `make test`
- [ ] `make lint`

Additional evidence (logs/screenshots/benchmarks):

## Risk and rollback

- Risk level: Low / Medium / High
- Rollback plan:

## Checklist

- [ ] No secrets or sensitive values introduced
- [ ] Docs updated when relevant
- [ ] Scope is limited and reviewable
- [ ] Breaking changes explicitly documented
